name: Access Private Equity
overview:
Welcome to Private Equity Access, the first online recruiting engine designed specifically to match leading private equity firms with qualified, industry executives.

EXECUTIVES who join Private Equity Access have a unique opportunity to get in touch with top private equity firms. They develop a customized profile for each member that synthesizes their work experience with their professional interests. This individual profile ensures that member executives will only be paired with those private equity opportunities that are well suited to their career goals.

PRIVATE EQUITY FIRMS that join Private Equity Access now have a seamless and accurate way to identify the right executive for their latest portfolio deal. Once a firm inputs the parameters of a deal and the relevant executive characteristics, our search engine goes to work. They can intelligently search through our database of thousands of leading executives to find the perfect CEO, board member, or consultant for every deal.
